Reviews.Title: Great Gift Item!
Reviews.Author: Miriam
Reviews.Content: Gave as a gift to my 12 year old who loves it!  At this price planning on buying for the rest of them! Definitely a 5 star for me!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: S. Abecasis
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to bring my expensive camera on my vacation. I bought this and hoped for the best... I AM THRILLED! Great pics. Great price. No worries. Would recommend to anyone. Didn't buy it here, but based on this listing, I wish I had.

Reviews.Title: takes horrific pictures
Reviews.Author: Logan M.
Reviews.Content: terrible.  i understand the screen on the camera would be grainy, but the actually picture itself?!  takes horrific pictures f

Reviews.Title: A company should not be allowed to make this kind of junk.
Reviews.Author: Average_Joe
Reviews.Content: 1 word "JUNK", they put the decimal point the wrong place, it should be more of .12  megapixels. Looking for something my wife could send home with her students, but when testing, the pics were all grainy and over exposed. Will do a better job as a paper weight, to light for a door stop.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Kitkat
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our son and I didn't expect much but the power button stopped working after 5 minutes. We were, however, able to return the item with no problems and Refurb King refunded our money.

Reviews.Title: Red Emerson 12 Mega Pixel Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Marci
Reviews.Content: Power button broke!  My daughter took 1 pic and it broke!  Bought a nice card for it and went to put in in and could not power it up.  She was crushed!
